name: Hagia
description:
Unity in diversity. A peaceful motto from my country.

This illustration is inspired by a song from Barasuara - Hagia.

Sempurna yang kau puja, dan ayat ayat yang kau baca.
Tak kurasa berbeda, kita bebas untuk percaya.
Seperti kami pun mengampuni, yang bersalah kepada kami.

A song that inspired me always to respect the difference and reminds me of how beautiful we are with all the diversity in this world.

Religion is a part of humanity. All people have the right to choose and or not to choose it.
We can be different and still be a family.
